      • setDeck

        public void setDeck(CardDeck curr)
        Sets the main deck of the player, and additionally adds another deck where the used cards will go. Also a temporary deck to use as a buffer in the future will be set too, both with the same ctype of the main deck.
        Parameters:
        curr - The deck that the player will use.

      • getCurrentDeck

        public CardDeck getCurrentDeck()

        Returns:

        Gets the used cards deck.
        Returns:
        CardDeck

      • top

        public AbstractCard top()
        Returns the top card of the deck. If the main deck is empty, then the cards from the used deck should be reused and must be shuffled first.
        Returns:
        The top card of player's cards.

      • hasCards

        public boolean hasCards()
        Checks whether the player has remaining cards or not.
        Returns:
        True if the player has any card left , false otherwise.

      • saveCard
